Your Personalised Trekking Experience Starts Here

Experience the very best the European Alps has to offer with our personalised trekking holidays. Whether you are looking for a guided or self-guided trek, we are committed to providing an excellent level of service throughout. Mont Blanc Treks is run by a specialised team dedicated to providing outstanding guided and self guided trekking holidays.

Tour of the Jotunheimen Norway

Difficult

Although our home is in the European Alps we love to venture to other mountainous areas of the world. First and foremost, to get to know these stunning high places, experience the culture and make new friends. With knowledge and experience gained, we had the idea of creating a select number of bespoke worldwide treks that we could offer to our clients.

We have developed partnerships between experienced local guides & porters, who have helped us select the best trails in their beautiful mountain ranges. Our current worldwide itineraries include the iconic Himalayan Annapurna, Patagonia, Peru and the Moroccan Atlas Mountains. Join us on one of our challenging and cultural journeys elsewhere in the world.

About Mont Blanc Treks

Mont Blanc Treks is run by a small, dedicated team of like-minded people whose local knowledge and passion for the mountains inspires us to offer a more personalised service for all our trekking holidays.

All our guided alpine treks are led by qualified UIMLA mountain professionals who ensure your safety at all times as well as offering you a wealth of information regarding the flora, fauna and history of the area.

We are proud to have been awarded the Feefo Trusted Service Award for 6 years running!
